email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a load port in Houston and discharge in Rotterdam. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Please let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider a rate in the high 40s? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer a revised rate of $49.75 per ton. The laycan is October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. $49.75 sounds reasonable. Can we confirm the laycan as October 15-20? Also, could you provide details on demurrage terms? Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, glad to hear the rate works for you. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for October 15-20. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if you need anything else to proceed. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the freight rate of $49.75 per ton and the laycan of October 15-20. Please send over the contract for review. Thanks for your help! Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the contract and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
